page.title: 08CARAVAN SITE.
page.content:
CARAVAN SITE.
The caravan site opened for the season 1962-3. It takes 70 static caravans and 40 tourers and also a number of tents. The touring caravans are used mostly for weekends and the site is also used for winter storage.The site opens the week before Easter and closes in October.The facilities include toilets and hot showers, sinks, and a drying room.There is no bar and no organised entertainment, the main attraction being the nearby beach. Charge for the season is Â£210 plus Â£50 for winter storage.The site is well lit and further security is provided by Mr.Slater and his dog.No caravan exceeding 7 metres in length may be brought onto the site.
